title: Bug 102623 - Image not refreshing after re-importing
description: When a new image ('image1.jpg') is imported into the layout, it is not being refreshed and the original image remains displayed.
EB: After importing a new image ('image1.jpg') into the layout, the new image should be displayed, replacing the original image.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Import the new image ('image1.jpg') into the layout.

Expected result:
The new image should replace the original image and be displayed in the layout.

Actual result:
The original image remains displayed and the new image does not appear in the layout.
